name: AutoMathText
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A 200 GB dataset of mathematical texts curated autonomously to enhance language models' mathematical reasoning.
notes: AutoMathText was developed using Autonomous Data Selection (AutoDS), employing language models as zero-shot verifiers to autonomously curate high-quality mathematical content. Empirical evaluations demonstrated that language models continually pretrained on AutoMathText achieved substantial improvements on mathematical benchmarks, underscoring the dataset's efficacy in enhancing mathematical reasoning capabilities.
